titleStmt.title: New additions to the art of husbandry comprizing a new way of enriching meadows, destroying of moles, making tulips of any colour : with an approved way for ordering of fish and fish-ponds ... with directions for breeding and ordering all sorts of singing-birds : with remedies for their several maladies not before publickly made known.
titleStmt.author: Blagrave, Joseph, 1610-1682.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to J. Blagrave by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
